adrFormatAddress: 130 W 78th St #1, New York, NY 10024-6728, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Vardy saves the day! After knowing her family for years, I can confidently say that she is beyond compassionate and committed to providing the best care possible. She has helped me so much and is very dedicated to giving her patients exactly what they need.

text.text: Dr. Vardy saves the day! After knowing her family for years, I can confidently say that she is beyond compassionate and committed to providing the best care possible. She has helped me so much and is very dedicated to giving her patients exactly what they need.

originalText.text: Honestly can’t say enough good things about her.  I first came to Dr. Vardy 11 years ago for a full Invisalign treatment.  I had met with two other orthodontists, but her attention to detail and her patient care really impressed me.  Here I am 11 years later still amazed at the time and care she gives to her patients and more importantly, her worth ethic.  (I had a problem with a new tray and she bent over backwards to help solve the problem with the manufacturing company.)  She doesn’t overbook, she’s always on time, and really goes the extra mile for her patients.  In this day and age of diminishing customer service,  she’s still doing it the right way.  I am so happy that I chose her.

originalText.text: Dr.Vardy is a true professional. I loved her team too. My son was so happy with her  and what an amazing job she did! She was so caring,  articulate, and thorough Looking forward to our second son in braces. She really makes a difference. My son’s smile and mine could not be fuller!! Very well done!

text.text: Dr.Vardy is a true professional. I loved her team too. My son was so happy with her  and what an amazing job she did! She was so caring,  articulate, and thorough Looking forward to our second son in braces. She really makes a difference. My son’s smile and mine could not be fuller!! Very well done!

originalText.text: Came to Dr. Vardy based on Yelp reviews. I am just in NYC for school and my permanent retainer from years ago broke. She was able to quickly fit me in to help me fix it and work with my personal needs. Dr. Vardy clearly takes great pride in her work and takes tons of time to speak with and educate her patients. I am glad I found her and feel like I have a much better understanding of my oral health moving forward.

text.text: Came to Dr. Vardy based on Yelp reviews. I am just in NYC for school and my permanent retainer from years ago broke. She was able to quickly fit me in to help me fix it and work with my personal needs. Dr. Vardy clearly takes great pride in her work and takes tons of time to speak with and educate her patients. I am glad I found her and feel like I have a much better understanding of my oral health moving forward.

originalText.text:
Dr. Vardy and her expert team have taken wonderful care of my family for years.  What sets the Vardy Orthodonics practice apart, in my view, is the personalized care which is becoming increasingly rare in medicine.

Dr. Vardy has a talent for empowering her patients to achieve better health.  Indeed since becoming her patient, treatment provided to my son has translated to a marked improvement in his sleep quality which has only positive downstream effects. Who doesn’t want better sleep?

Communication is a snap. The Vardy practice uses an app for everything from appointments to sending photos of any issues to documents, insurance paperwork, records etc.

In short, Vardy Orthodontics makes what can be a stressful experience — orthodontic work — an absolute breeze. Highly recommended for the stressed out New Yorker!
